subject: Re: [junit] Essay: The Trouble With JUnit
msgSnippet: ... OK. I guess I really have to write it now. Look for it somewhere between spring and autumn 2008. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your
messageBody:

OK. I guess I really have to write it now. Look for it somewhere between
